title: Kylie Jenner’s Playboy bunny costume is her sexiest Halloween look
text:
Kylie’s Playboy bunny outfit is next level (Picture: Instagram)

Kylie Jenner doesn’t do things by halves for Halloween but she might have just outdone herself with her sexiest costume ever, as she channelled a Playboy bunny.

The make up mogul, 22, had her hair styles in loose waves as she donned the iconic bunny ears, corseted strapless leotard and white collar and cuffs.

Her costume was in honour of her best friend Anastasia Karanikolaou’s Playboy-themed party, and she told her followers: ‘Stas said I’m having a Playboy party pull up.’

Given that Kylie’s actually been on the cover of Playboy, earlier this year, we reckon this party was right up her street.

She had been the cover star for the September ‘pleasure’ issue, alongside her then-boyfriend Travis Scott, though she didn’t rock the ears in that shoot.

Guests to Stassi’s party were expected to dress up as bunnies, and were treated to a variety of themed cocktails, with names like ‘Hefner’, ‘Playmate’, ‘Stassiebunny’ and ‘Forgive Me Father’.

Advertisement

Advertisement

The Playboy bunny look is Kylie’s second amazing Halloween outfit of the year, with her first dressing up as Madonna from her 2003 MTV Video Music Awards performance with Britney Spears.

To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

Kylie donned the iconic costume for her bestie’s Halloween party (Picture: @kyliejenner)

Stassi, meanwhile, donned Britney’s white dress from the performance, and the pair even recreated the much talked-about stage kiss that Britney and Madonna shared.

However, the night didn’t end well for Kylie as her cab was involved in a fender-bender on the way to Demi Lovato’s party, and although the scrape was nothing major, it put her off the party mood and she ended up bailing on the bash.

Stormi dressed up as Kylie Jenner at the Met Gala for Halloween and it’s too cute (Picture: Kylie Jenner

Kylie and Stassi had previously dressed up as Madonna and Britney to recreate their stage kiss (Picture: @Kyliejenner/Instagram_)

Kylie also made sure Stormi got in the Halloween spirit, as she dressed up her mini-me in her purple feathered Met Gala look from earlier in the year.

Advertisement

Advertisement

There’s still a couple more days until Halloween itself, so we’re already excited to see what else Kylie’s got up her sleeve for the day.

And if we get more cute lookalike costumes from Stormi dressing up in her mum’s iconic outfits, we definitely won’t be complaining.

description: Kylie Jenner dressed up as a Playboy bunny to celebrate Halloween in her sexiest costume to date.
